title: Conan O'Brien
description:
This week Kevin is joined by comedian and television host Conan O’Brien on Comedy Gold Minds. O’Brien discusses everything including his start at SNL as a writer, how Lorne Michaels helped him get his big break in late night TV, his podcast ‘Conan O’Brien Needs a Friend’, and what he’d like to do next in the entertainment world. 

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Kevin Hart, Conan O'Brien)
